prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Collection of William Stanley Braithwaite, Accession #6787, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited on 15 May 1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Collection of letters, photographs, manuscripts, sonnets, poetry, broadside, postcards, telegrams, drawing, material relating to Braithwaite's anthologies of American poetry, also including "Ten Best Books of Poems," 1912-1926, and a questionnaire.
